title: When do the students receive their laptops at SMIT? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends when SMIT places its order, when i was in 2012 batch i got it before coming home for Pooja Vacations. Our juniors got it during their first semester. You can expect getting your Laptop during October-november. Usually they distribute it in slots like Section A getting it first and so on. Do get a laptop lock, they will ask for it while haning you the laptop.

Well, I am just one batch senior to yours so according to my experience, our batch got the laptops in December, right before the December end-sem exams (so you probably know what happened to our exams once we got our lappys!). So in all probability, you too will get it in December. P.S. Don’t get fooled when you’re seniors suddenly tell you in Mid-October that the laptops are being distributed in bizarre places such as the Director’s Chamber or in the Common Canteen. It’s definitely a hoax!
